Package net.coderazzi.filters.gui.editor

Class Summary
ChoicesListModel List model to handle the choices in the popup menu.
EditorComponent Component representing the filter editor itself, where the user can enter the filter text (if not rendered) and is displayed the current filter choice.
FilterEditor Custom component to handle the filter' editors
It includes: A editor component, a text field to enter the filter text. A popup menu containing both history and predefined choice elements. An arrow button to display the popup menu.
FilterEditorBeanInfo
